example: The magnificent castle stood on the hill.
The view from the mountain top was truly magnificent.

clozeTestExamples.clozeSentence: The ancient ruins were incredibly ______. Visitors marveled at their beauty.
clozeTestExamples.clozeSentenceTranslation: 这些古老的遗迹真是令人惊叹。游客们对它们的美丽赞不绝口。

clozeTestExamples.clozeSentence: Her performance was so ______ that the audience gave her a standing ovation.
clozeTestExamples.clozeSentenceTranslation: 她的表演如此精彩，以至于观众起立鼓掌。
